caption: This photograph captures a scene inside a church during a service. The setting features wooden pews filled with congregants who are attentively facing forward towards the altar. The foreground shows the backs of several people, including a man in a dark suit and a woman with curly hair. The middle ground offers a clearer view of a clergyman dressed in a white robe with a red stole, actively gesturing as he speaks from behind a wooden pulpit. Beside the pulpit, there is a small podium with a red fabric hanging. On the steps of the altar area, several lit candles and a large red banner with white text that adds to the ceremonial ambiance are visible. The interior architecture includes paneled wood walls and a large, modern stained-glass window on the right. The atmosphere seems solemn and reflective, typical of a religious service.
title: Religion plays an important part in the lives of residents. The second largest denomination of church goers are Lutherans of Scandinavian descent. This photo shows the modern interior members of the congregation and minister at Our Savior's. This church holds baptism after church, and has its own mixed choir and Sunday school.
